text: Ani (arthata he karana ahe) tumhi kasa prakare inkara karu sakata, vastavika tumhala allahacya ayati vacuna aikavilya jatata, ani tumacya daramyana paigambara (sallallahu alaihi vasallama) hajara aheta, ani jo allahacya dina-dharmala majabutapane dharela tara nihsansaya tyala saralamarga dakhavila gela ahe
